mapper.select: SELECT T1.PSID,T1.PID,T1.MODEL_NUMBER, T1.MODEL_SIZE, T1.S_PRICE, T1.S_STOCK, MIN(T2.SALEID) AS SALEID,T2.PRICE FROM RESELL_PRODUCT_SIZE T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM SALE T2 WHERE (T2.SIZE_TYPE,T2.PRICE) IN (SELECT SIZE_TYPE,MIN(PRICE) FROM SALE WHERE STATUS1='판매입찰' GROUP BY SIZE_TYPE ) ) T2 ON T1.PID = T2.PID AND T1.MODEL_SIZE = T2.SIZE_TYPE WHERE T1.pid = #{pid} GROUP BY T1.PSID,T1.PID,T1.MODEL_NUMBER, T1.MODEL_SIZE, T1.S_PRICE, T1.S_STOCK,T2.PRICE ORDER BY T1.MODEL_SIZE ASC

SELECT T1.PSID,T1.PID,T1.MODEL_NUMBER, T1.MODEL_SIZE, T1.S_PRICE, T1.S_STOCK, MIN(T2.SALEID) AS SALEID,T2.PRICE FROM RESELL_PRODUCT_SIZE T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM SALE T2 WHERE (T2.PRICE) IN (SELECT MIN(PRICE) FROM SALE WHERE STATUS1='판매입찰' AND SIZE_TYPE=#{size} ) ) T2 ON T1.PID = T2.PID AND T1.MODEL_SIZE = T2.SIZE_TYPE WHERE T1.pid = #{pid} AND T1.MODEL_SIZE = #{size} GROUP BY T1.PSID,T1.PID,T1.MODEL_NUMBER, T1.MODEL_SIZE, T1.S_PRICE, T1.S_STOCK,T2.PRICE

SELECT T1.PSID,T1.PID,T1.MODEL_NUMBER, T1.MODEL_SIZE, T1.S_PRICE, T1.S_STOCK, MAX(T2.BUYID) AS SALEID,T2.PRICE FROM RESELL_PRODUCT_SIZE T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM buy T2 WHERE (T2.SIZE_TYPE,T2.PRICE) IN (SELECT SIZE_TYPE,MAX(PRICE) FROM buy WHERE STATUS1='구매입찰' GROUP BY SIZE_TYPE ) ) T2 ON T1.PID = T2.PID AND T1.MODEL_SIZE = T2.SIZE_TYPE WHERE T1.pid = #{pid} GROUP BY T1.PSID,T1.PID,T1.MODEL_NUMBER, T1.MODEL_SIZE, T1.S_PRICE, T1.S_STOCK,T2.PRICE ORDER BY T1.MODEL_SIZE ASC

SELECT T1.PSID,T1.PID,T1.MODEL_NUMBER, T1.MODEL_SIZE, T1.S_PRICE, T1.S_STOCK, MAX(T2.BUYID) AS BUYID,T2.PRICE FROM RESELL_PRODUCT_SIZE T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM BUY T2 WHERE (T2.PRICE) IN (SELECT MAX(PRICE) FROM BUY WHERE STATUS1='구매입찰' AND SIZE_TYPE=#{size} ) ) T2 ON T1.PID = T2.PID AND T1.MODEL_SIZE = T2.SIZE_TYPE WHERE T1.pid =#{pid} AND T1.MODEL_SIZE =#{size} GROUP BY T1.PSID,T1.PID,T1.MODEL_NUMBER, T1.MODEL_SIZE, T1.S_PRICE, T1.S_STOCK,T2.PRICE
mapper.update: UPDATE SALE SET STATUS1='진행완료', NOWDATE = SYSDATE WHERE SALEID = #{saleid}
UPDATE BUY SET STATUS1='진행완료', NOWDATE = SYSDATE WHERE BUYID = #{buyid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT SIZE_TYPE, PRICE, NOWDATE FROM BUY WHERE STATUS1='진행완료' AND PID= #{pid} UNION ALL SELECT SIZE_TYPE, PRICE, NOWDATE FROM SALE WHERE STATUS1='진행완료' AND PID= #{pid} ) ORDER BY NOWDATE DESC
SELECT SIZE_TYPE, PRICE, COUNT(SIZE_TYPE) AS AMOUNT FROM BUY WHERE STATUS1='구매입찰' AND PID= #{pid} GROUP BY SIZE_TYPE, PRICE ORDER BY PRICE DESC
SELECT SIZE_TYPE, PRICE, COUNT(SIZE_TYPE) AS AMOUNT FROM SALE WHERE STATUS1='판매입찰' AND PID= #{pid} GROUP BY SIZE_TYPE, PRICE ORDER BY PRICE ASC
